name: astro-decap-cms-starter
title: Astro Decap CMS Starter
desc: A starter theme for Astro and Decap CMS. It is fully compatible with SEO and has amazing UI/UX, as well as a great developer experience.
article:
Astro Decap CMS Starter is a starter theme for Astro and Decap CMS. It is fully compatible with SEO and has amazing UI/UX, as well as a great developer experience. This theme uses a git-based CMS, which allows you to manage your content as a CMS from anywhere.

To use the theme, simply download it from GitHub and install it in your Astro project. Once installed, you can start creating posts and pages with the built-in CMS. The theme also includes a number of features that make it easy to customize your site, such as a color picker, a font selector, and a layout builder.

If you are looking for a powerful and easy-to-use starter theme for Astro and Decap CMS, then Astro Decap CMS Starter is the perfect choice for you.

Here are some additional details about the theme:

  • Features:
  • SEO-friendly
  • Amazing UI/UX Great developer experience Git-based CMS Color picker Font selector Layout builder
  • Benefits:
  • Easy to use
  • Powerful
  • Customizable
  • SEO-friendly
  • Requirements:
  • Astro CMS
  • Decap CMS

github.name: astro-decap-cms-starter
github.description: Portfolio with a blog part built with Astro and backend with Decap (netlify) CMS
